reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Improved access to employment opportunities for Lebanese and refugee graduates from skills training.

description.narrative: L'iniziativa prevede pertanto di rafforzare le capacità del sistema di formazione professionale dei giovani libanesi e dei rifugiati siriani (i) nell'erogazione di servizi per l'impiego e (ii) nell'elaborazione e attuazione di programmi di formazione che rispondono alle esigenze del mercato del lavoro.

The project envisages strengthening the capacity of the Lebanese technical vocational education and training system (i) in the provision of employment services and (ii) in the design and implementation of market-based vocational trainings. To achieve these results, the project will train NGO staff and training centers on employment services, and will strengthen the capacities of the National Employment Office (NEO) and public technical schools.

tag.narrative: By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training
By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship
Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
